headline: Regeneron Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (REGN): Among Blue Chip Stocks to Invest in at 52-Week Lows

headline: abrdn Life Sciences Investors Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: The equity portion of the Abrdn Life Sciences Investors Fund fell (gross) but outperformed its benchmark for Q4 2024. Click here to read the full commentary.
